post.author: 박경종
post.content:
The positions below are currently available through Procom. If you meet the
qualifications and are interested in this opportunity please apply as per the
instructions below. Please note, this automated email has been sent to you as
the result of a successful keyword search on your resume within our database.
Please use discretion by only applying to positions that best suit your
qualifications. If you wish to remove yourself from future mailings, please
click the link supplied below.

Position:Vision Plus Programmer

Location: 3 days working from home and 2 in Oakville
Duration: 1 year
Rate/Salary:$55/hr if INC.
Start Date: October 2004

Job Description:
Large consulting company is looking for consultants with strong experience with
Vision Plus.

Requirements:
-Candidates must have previous Vision Plus programming experience
-Excellent coding,debbuging and troubleshooting skills
-Team Lead experience required
-Previous financial service industry experience would be preferred


Position: Business Analyst
*Experience with Vision Plus is a must*

Location:EUROPE
Duration:6 months +
Rate/Salary:$65-$75/hr if INC.
Start Date:October 2004

Job Description:
Our client within the financial services industry is looking for a Business
Analyst with strong Vision Plus knowledge.
Requirements:
-Strong Vision Plus knowledge
-Experience writing business requirements, business processes and documentation
-Technical background with good understanding of business would be considered


PROCOM SERVICES
A leading provider of IT services in North America, PROCOM and PROCOM SERVICES
currently have more than 1700 consultants on assignment. For over 25 years, we
have been finding high-quality jobs for our consultants. Our policies of
maintaining open communication with both clients and consultants consistently
make us the IT Firm of Choice.

We would like to thank you for your interest. Please note that all submissions
will be assessed. However, only suitable candidates will be contacted further.

Please submit your most recent resume as a Word format to:
rossanap@procom.ca
No phone calls please
post.title: Vision Plus Programmer
